org.eclipse.papyrus.MARTE.MARTE_DesignModel.HRM.HwLogical.HwStorage.HwMemory

Interface HwDrive

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, HwMemory, HwResource, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier, Resource, StorageResource
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HwDriveImpl

    public interface HwDrive
extends HwMemory
    A representation of the model object 'Hw Drive'.

    The following features are supported:

    • Sector Size
    • Buffer

    See Also:
    HwMemoryPackage.getHwDrive()
